EVery Creature being born of corrupted nature, hath that ≈øpirit in him that lu≈øts enviou≈øly again≈øt God, and that ≈øeed in him, and growing up with him, which daily ≈øeeks to en≈ønare his Soul further into wickedne≈øs and vanity, and to increa≈øe his ≈øeparation from God, by drawing in iniquity, and filling the Temple where God ≈øhould dwell and be known, with the accur≈øed things which God hates and cannot behold; for this evil ≈øeed being ≈øubtile and forward, prevails above the pure Life, and leads out the mind from it into many ≈øeveral temptations, pre≈øenting them with delight unto the carnal part, and outward ≈øences, whereby the Seed of God becomes continually vailed and hid from the creature, ≈øo that man knows not that Word of Life by which he was created, nor can he come to be guided by it in him≈øelf, till the head of this evil ≈øeed be brui≈øed, through believing in that Light which comes from the Life, by which the World was made; and this is that Rock which follows man with its unchangeable te≈øtimony, bearing witne≈øs onely to that which is of him≈øelf, and again≈øt all the wayes of that evil ≈øeed, calling and reproving the World becau≈øe thereof, which call as many as receives and hearkens to, by Faith comes to hear the Word of Life, wherein Power is received to become the Sons of God; which Power of Life, as it ari≈øes in the Promi≈øed Seed, the head of the evil ≈øeed is brui≈øed, and he comes to be brought under, who had taken the Soul captive at his will to every vain and evil work: and ≈øo as the Creature comes to be redeemed from under the power of darkne≈øs, ≈øo he comes to be guided in the Light of that Life by which he came into the World; and that Light which before reproved him for his deeds of darkne≈øs (following him from one to another, condemning him

Now the Light of the World, is Gods love to the World; for God ≈øo loved the World when it was in the power of darkne≈øs, that he gave his Son into the World, a Covenant of Light, that who≈øoever followeth him ≈øhould not abide in darkne≈øs, but ≈øhould have the Light of Life; Now Gods Love „Äà‚Ä¶„Äâ in the light of the World, That's his Covenant with the ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ d, which who≈øoever rejects and receives not, is out of Gods love, and in the enmity, out of Gods Covenant, neither can he in that ≈øtate believe that Gods love is in it. And this is the cau≈øe why all men ≈øpeak evil of the Light, who love their evil deeds, and cannot receive it as Gods Love, and the way to life, to ≈øuch it is condemnation; not that it was intended thereto; but men loving darkne≈øs rather then light, it becomes condemnation; but to him that believes, and is obedient, to him it is precious: for who follows it out of the World, there receives the Nature of Sons, and the Love of the Father, which the World cannot receive, and the Power of Godline≈øs, and Trea≈øure of eternal Life; and this is not given to any till they come out of the World, as he is not of the World, for therein ≈øtands Gods Covenant with Abrahams Seed for ever.

So Gods Love to the World (while men are in that corrupt nature, and the Witne≈øs of the Spirit of Truth) is to reprove the World of ≈øin, and te≈øtifie condemnation again≈øt the deeds thereof; but to ≈øuch as have received it, it's a Leader, Comforter, and Saviour; and this is the cau≈øe why the one loves, and the other hates, each Nature ≈øpeaking that ≈øtate in which it ≈øtands towards God, and as it hath obtained from him in Chri≈øt Je≈øus, love or condemnation; and he that will not receive Gods love that calls him out, mu≈øt abide under the power of the ≈øeed which God hates; and this is he that ≈øeeks to murther him that is in Gods love, the evil one having power to blind that mind (who denies the Light)
≈øo far, till he cannot ≈øee that the Murtherer is of the Divel, but thinks he is doing God ≈øervice; and this in the end hath ever befallen ≈øuch Profe≈ø≈øors as reject the Light of the World, for he that walks in darkne≈øs knows not whither he goes; but God is Light, and in him is no darkne≈øs at all, nor hath darkne≈øs any fellow≈øhip with him: here is known the Children of God, and the children of darkne≈øs; he that loves the Light, brings his deeds to the Light, and hath fellow≈øhip with God in his deeds, and this works the Work of God; and he that denies the Light, works in darkne≈øs, and cannot believe the Power that is in the Light, being under the power of darkne≈øs.

And therefore he that is born after the fle≈øh, knows not him that is born after the Spirit of Light, nor can judge of his wayes, which are ≈øtrange and wonders in his carnal ≈øight, neither knows he by what power and love that is, by which he overcomes the World, and takes plea≈øure in denying the plea≈øures thereof, and vanqui≈øheth all its vanities out of the heart and mind, and can no more rejoyce in the World, nor make merry with its mirth; but rejoyceth in the Truth, and is made glad with that which ≈øaves him from ≈øuch folly; the wicked knows not the life of the Righteous, nor the ≈øpring whence his Virtues ari≈øe, nor the power of his Change, nor the end of all his patient ≈øufferings and tryals, but ≈øtands wondering at it as folly and madne≈øs; that eye being blinded by the god of this world, which ≈øhould give the ≈øight thereof, and that ≈øeed in bondage under the prince of darkne≈øs, which ≈øhould give to inherit that immortal Trea≈øure; and this mu≈øt be, till there be a denying and coming out of the World to receive that inheritance of divine Light and under≈øtanding, which none can receive, nor be one withal, but as they come out of the world from under that ≈øeed of enmity which ≈øeeks to pervert all the right wayes of God, and wre≈øt all his gifts to mans de≈øtruction as far as he can prevail.

And here is the cau≈øe of that ≈øtrong contention that hath ever been betwixt the Children of Light, who are born of that Spirit of Truth, and have their light and ≈øtrength in the inward man; and the worlds profe≈ø≈øors, who≈øe expectation ≈øtands in ≈øomething without them, which others have ≈øpoken of who had it in them; and ≈øo not knowing the Power and My≈øtery of the living Faith, which is holden in a pure Con≈øcience, which only hath the Call and Power to bring out of the worlds darkne≈øs, they are kept captive therein, contending again≈øt the Spiritual Light; and ≈øo while they are in the world, go about to comprehend and mea≈øure that Spirit of Truth, which the world cannot receive, neither knoweth, thinking that Spirit of Light and Life to have no other op ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ ion in ≈øuch
who are led out of the world, and born thereof, and in whom Chri≈øt lives, than they find it to have in them≈øelves, who ≈øtumble at it, and are di≈øobedient and unbelieving in heart; when as indeed to us that believe, it is Elect and Precious who come to it for all ≈øupplies; but to the wi≈ødom and profe≈ø≈øion of the world, it is a Rock of offence, and ≈øtumbling-≈øtone, yet is it the Head of the Corner; and in them who revile it and reject it, it is become all they have in them that is good, true, and faithful towards God, or their Souls, as their hearts in ≈øecret do witne≈øs to them, and leaves them without excu≈øe many times.

And now he that comes to you with this Doctrine, comes near you, being manife≈øt in Spirit to that of God in your own hearts, you are pricked therewith, and then the evil one is ≈øtirred up in you, to fight again≈øt that which is Truth in your ≈øelves, and an≈øwers to the Truth which is ≈øpoken to you, by another without you, from the ≈øame Spirit of Truth, which by you is rejected; And thus you joyning with him that ri≈øes up in wrath again≈øt the Truth in your ≈øelves, and denying that which ≈øhould chain and bind the evil one, you deny the Lord of Life, and give ≈øtrength to the evil one to murther the Ju≈øt in you, and quench the Spirit of Truth, and weary the Lord with ≈øtriving, till you be given up wholly to the power of darkne≈øs, who will then keep you ≈øeeking Salvation without, while≈øt he is heaping up evil within.
